sys_update_xml.name: sys_ws_operation_c3820c82db85e740b86770c08c961938
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl>cf9d01d3e73003009d6247e603f6a990</enforce_acl><http_method>GET</http_method><name>fetchUserByIds</name><operation_script><![CDATA[(function process(/*RESTAPIRequest*/ request, /*RESTAPIResponse*/ response) {
	 var users = [];
	 var searchCriteria = request.queryParams.ids.toString();
	 var ids = searchCriteria.split("|");
 
	 var user_item = new GlideRecord('sys_user');
	 var tmp = user_item.addQuery('sys_id', 'IN', ids);
         user_item.query();
	 
	while(user_item.next()){
		 var value = user_item.getDisplayValue('first_name') + " " + user_item.getDisplayValue('last_name');
		 var label = value;
		 var id = user_item.getDisplayValue('sys_id');
		 var email = user_item.getDisplayValue('email');
		 var phone = user_item.getDisplayValue('phone');
		 var title = user_item.getDisplayValue('title');
		 var manager = user_item.getDisplayValue('manager');
		 var manager_id = user_item.manager.sys_id.toString();
		 var id_number = user_item.getDisplayValue('employee_number');
		 var institution = user_item.getDisplayValue("department");
		 var doc = user_item.getDisplayValue("u_long_org_division");
		 if (email) {
			 label += "  [" + email + "]";
		 }
		 users.push({label: label, value: value, id: id, email: email, phone: phone, title: title, id_number: id_number, manager: manager, manager_id: manager_id, institution: institution, doc: doc});
		
     }
   
     return users;

})(request, response);]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/x_naci_account_act/accountactivationscoped/fetchUserByIds</operation_uri><produces>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</produces><produces_customized>false</produces_customized><relative_path>/fetchUserByIds</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>false</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>true</requires_authentication><short_description/><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>yuw5@nih.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-10-10 17:01:22</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>c3820c82db85e740b86770c08c961938</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>fetchUserByIds</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Account Activation" source="x_naci_account_act">cff40c40dbb29f00f59974131f961939</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Account Activation">cff40c40dbb29f00f59974131f961939</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_c3820c82db85e740b86770c08c961938</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>yuw5@nih.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-10-10 17:36:15</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="accountActivationScoped">7e930e58db7e134054d8ff621f96195e</web_service_definition><web_service_version/></sys_ws_operation></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl/><http_method>GET</http_method><name>getSavedRequestData</name><operation_script><![CDATA[(function process(/*RESTAPIRequest*/ request, /*RESTAPIResponse*/ response) {

    savedData = {};
    var  id = request.queryParams.id;
	
	var appName = "AccountActivation";
	var gr_saved_items = new GlideRecord('x_naci_account_act_account_activation_saved_request');
	    gr_saved_items.addQuery('u_application_name', appName); 
		gr_saved_items.addQuery('sys_id', id);
        gr_saved_items.orderByDesc('sys_created_on');
        gr_saved_items.query();
		gr_saved_items.next();	
	    savedData = JSON.parse(gr_saved_items.getDisplayValue('u_value'));
    
	return savedData;
})(request, response);]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/x_naci_account_act/accountactivationscoped/getSavedRequestData</operation_uri><produces>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</produces><produces_customized>false</produces_customized><relative_path>/getSavedRequestData</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>false</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>true</requires_authentication><short_description/><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-06-15 20:10:45</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>719c4e90dbbe134054d8ff621f961990</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>getSavedRequestData</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Account Activation" source="x_naci_account_act">cff40c40dbb29f00f59974131f961939</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Account Activation">cff40c40dbb29f00f59974131f961939</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_719c4e90dbbe134054d8ff621f961990</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-08-08 14:05:46</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="accountActivationScoped">7e930e58db7e134054d8ff621f96195e</web_service_definition><web_service_version/></sys_ws_operation></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ws_operation_1dcc82d0dbbe134054d8ff621f961930
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl/><http_method>GET</http_method><name>getSubmittedRequestDataById</name><operation_script><![CDATA[(function process(/*RESTAPIRequest*/ request, /*RESTAPIResponse*/ response) {
	var sysId = request.queryParams.id;	
	var year = new GlideDateTime().getYearLocalTime();  
	var gr_requested_items = new GlideRecord('x_naci_account_act_account_activation_table');
		gr_requested_items.addQuery('sys_id', sysId);
		gr_requested_items.orderByDesc('number');
		gr_requested_items.addQuery('active',true);
		gr_requested_items.query();
		gr_requested_items.next();
	var item = {};
    var comments =  gr_requested_items.comments.getJournalEntry(-1);
	var manager_id = gr_requested_items.manager.toString();
	var user_item = new GlideRecord('sys_user');
	    user_item.addQuery('sys_id', manager_id);
	    user_item.query();
	    user_item.next();
	var manager = user_item.name.toString();
	if(manager == null || manager.trim().length == 0){
		manager = "";
	}
	item.name =  gr_requested_items.name.toString();
	item.number = gr_requested_items.number.toString();
	item.number = "DA-"+year+"-"+item.number.substring(8);
	item.title = gr_requested_items.title.toString();
	item.id_number = gr_requested_items.id_number.toString();
	item.institute = 'NCI';
	item.division = gr_requested_items.division.toString();
	item.manager_id = manager_id;
	item.manager = manager;
	item.sdso = gr_requested_items.sdso.toString();
	item.requested_for = gr_requested_items.u_requested_for.toString();
	item.type = gr_requested_items.type.toString();
	item.tenure_track = gr_requested_items.tenure_track.toString();
	item.senior_scientist = gr_requested_items.senior_scientist.toString();
	item.staff_scientist = gr_requested_items.staff_scientist.toString();
	item.program_officer = gr_requested_items.program_officer.toString();
	item.project_officer = gr_requested_items.project_officer.toString();
	item.other = gr_requested_items.other.toString();
	item.administrative = gr_requested_items.administrative.toString();
	item.substantial_research = gr_requested_items.substantial_research.toString();
	item.need_access = gr_requested_items.need_access.toString();
	item.oversight = gr_requested_items.oversight.toString();
	item.comments = comments.toString();
	item.additionalComments = gr_requested_items.extra_comments.toString();
	return item;
})(request, response);]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/x_naci_account_act/accountactivationscoped/getSubmittedRequestDataById</operation_uri><produces>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</produces><produces_customized>false</produces_customized><relative_path>/getSubmittedRequestDataById</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>false</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>true</requires_authentication><short_description/><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-06-15 20:11:39</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>1dcc82d0dbbe134054d8ff621f961930</sys_id><sys_mod_count>30</sys_mod_count><sys_name>getSubmittedRequestDataById</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Account Activation" source="x_naci_account_act">cff40c40dbb29f00f59974131f961939</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Account Activation">cff40c40dbb29f00f59974131f961939</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_1dcc82d0dbbe134054d8ff621f961930</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>yuw5@nih.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-10-10 19:26:24</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="accountActivationScoped">7e930e58db7e134054d8ff621f96195e</web_service_definition><web_service_version/></sys_ws_operation></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sp_angular_provider_b3958190dbba134054d8ff621f96198f
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sp_angular_provider"><sp_angular_provider action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><name>accountActivationConstantScoped</name><script><![CDATA[function accountActivationConstantScoped() {
	this.applicationName = "AccountActivation";
	this.catItemDesc = "CBIIT Account Activation Application";
	this.names = ['name', 'title', 'institute', 'division', 'id_number', 'manager', 'tenure_track', 'senior_scientist', 'staff_scientist','program_officer','project_officer','other','administrative','substantial_research','need_access','oversight', 'type', 'additionalComments'];
	this.checkboxNames = ['tenure_track','senior_scientist','staff_scientist','program_officer','project_officer','other','administrative','substantial_research','need_access','oversight'];
	this.textField = ['name', 'title', 'id_number', 'manager'];
	this.approvalAction = 'approved';
	this.rejectAction = 'rejected';
	this.dsRole = "Direct Supervisor";
	this.sdsoRole = "Scientific Directors / Signing Official";
	this.specialPI = ['0b091f9c6fae2100250e6bbeae3ee440','4f091f9c6fae2100250e6bbeae3ee43d','77af7c696f6f2100e04fd15eae3ee420','04bf7c696f6f2100e04fd15eae3ee425','54bf7c696f6f2100e04fd15eae3ee49d','48cfb0a96f6f2100e04fd15eae3ee4ef','6dbffc696f6f2100e04fd15eae3ee487','0fbf70a96f6f2100e04fd15eae3ee46e'];
	this.specialSDSO = ['0fbf70a96f6f2100e04fd15eae3ee46e','fbf6d9006fef52001c857eeeae3ee407'];
	this.getApplicationName = function() {return this.applicationName;};
	this.getCatItemDesc = function() {return this.catItemDesc;};
	this.getNames = function(){return this.names};
	this.getCheckboxNames = function() {return this.checkboxNames};
	this.getTextField = function() {return this.textField;};
	this.getApprovalAction = function() {return this.approvalAction;};
	this.getRejectAction = function() {return this.rejectAction;};
	this.getDsRole = function() {return this.dsRole;};
	this.getSDSORole = function() {return this.sdsoRole;};
	this.getDivisions = function() {return this.divisions;};
	this.checkDivision = function(divisions, abbr) {
		var exist = false;
		for(var i = 0; i < divisions.length; i++){
			if(abbr == divisions[i].abbr){
				exist = true;
				break;
			}
		}
		return exist;
	};
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sp_angular_provider</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-06-15 15:00:38</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>b3958190dbba134054d8ff621f96198f</sys_id><sys_mod_count>39</sys_mod_count><sys_name>accountActivationConstantScoped</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Account Activation" source="x_naci_account_act">cff40c40dbb29f00f59974131f961939</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Account Activation">cff40c40dbb29f00f59974131f961939</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sp_angular_provider_b3958190dbba134054d8ff621f96198f</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-02-05 18:33:40</sys_updated_on><type>service</type></sp_angular_provider></record_update>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sp_css"><sp_css action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><css>.panel-heading.blue-panel {
  color: #fff;
  background-color: #0b4d86;
  border-color: #0b4d86;
}

.margin-bottom-small {
  margin-bottom: 3px !important;
}

sys_update_xml.name: sysauto_script_777060cedb892b4054d8ff621f96190f
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sysauto_script"><sysauto_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><condition/><conditional>false</conditional><name>dbGaP inactive user</name><run_as/><run_as_tz/><run_dayofmonth>1</run_dayofmonth><run_dayofweek>1</run_dayofweek><run_period/><run_start>2018-10-10 19:08:45</run_start><run_time>1970-01-01 05:10:00</run_time><run_type>weekly</run_type><script><![CDATA[var requestors = [];
var inactiveList = [];
var sysids = [];

var gr_items = new GlideRecord("x_naci_account_act_account_activation_table");
gr_items.addQuery("short_description", "CBIIT Account Activation Application");
gr_items.query();
while (gr_items.next()){
	var sysId = gr_items.sys_id.toString();
	var requestor = gr_items.u_requested_for.toString();
	if(requestors.indexOf(requestor) == -1){
		requestors.push(requestor);
	}
	sysids.push(sysId);
}


var user_item = new GlideRecord('sys_user');
    user_item.addQuery('active', false);
	user_item.addQuery('sys_id', 'IN', requestors.join());
	user_item.query();
	if(user_item.hasNext()) { 
		inactiveList.push(requestors[i]);
	}

for(var j = 0; j < sysids.length; j++){
	var gr3 = new GlideRecord('x_naci_account_act_account_activation_table');
	gr3.addQuery('sys_id', sysids[j]);
	gr3.query();
	gr3.next();
	var req = gr3.u_requested_for.toString();
	if(inactiveList.indexOf(req) > -1){
		gr3.active = false;
	}
	else{
		gr3.active = true;
	}
	gr3.update();
}


]]></script><sys_class_name>sysauto_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-10-10 19:09:12</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>777060cedb892b4054d8ff621f96190f</sys_id><sys_mod_count>14</sys_mod_count><sys_name>dbGaP inactive user</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Account Activation" source="x_naci_account_act">cff40c40dbb29f00f59974131f961939</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Account Activation">cff40c40dbb29f00f59974131f961939</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sysauto_script_777060cedb892b4054d8ff621f96190f</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-12-13 18:04:11</sys_updated_on><upgrade_safe>false</upgrade_safe></sysauto_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sp_angular_provider"><sp_angular_provider action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><name>accountActivationWithdrawRequestScoped</name><script><![CDATA[function accountActivationWithdrawRequestScoped($http){
	this.withdraw = function(id){
		return new Promise(function(resolve, reject){	
			var req = {
				method: 'GET',
				url: '/api/x_naci_account_act/accountactivationscoped/withdrawRequest',
				beforeSend: function(xhr) {
					xhr.setRequestHeader('X-UserToken', sessionId);
				},
				headers: {
					'Content-Type': 'application/json'
				},
				params: {
					'sysId': id
				}
			};		
		  $http(req).then(
			function (response){
				resolve(response.data.result);	
			}, function (error){
				reject(error);
			});
		});	
	};
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sp_angular_provider</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-07-09 20:34:09</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>63e7b9c0db13534054d8ff621f96196e</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>accountActivationWithdrawRequestScoped</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Account Activation" source="x_naci_account_act">cff40c40dbb29f00f59974131f961939</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Account Activation">cff40c40dbb29f00f59974131f961939</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sp_angular_provider_63e7b9c0db13534054d8ff621f96196e</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-07-09 20:37:05</sys_updated_on><type>service</type></sp_angular_provider></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sp_angular_provider"><sp_angular_provider action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><name>accountActivationCheckSubmitterScoped</name><script><![CDATA[function accountActivationCheckSubmitterScoped($http){
	
	this.checkSubmitter = function(id_num, sessionId){
		var data;
		$.ajax({
			dataType: "json",
			type: "GET",
			url: '/api/x_naci_account_act/accountactivationscoped/checkSubmitter',
			data: {id_number: id_num, desc: 'CBIIT Account Activation Application'},
			beforeSend: function(xhr){ xhr.setRequestHeader('X-UserToken', sessionId); },
			async: false,
			success: function(response){
				data = response.result;
			},
			error: function(data){
				alert("ERROR");
			}
		});	
		return data;
	}
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sp_angular_provider</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-06-15 15:07:02</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>3917cd90dbba134054d8ff621f96197d</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>accountActivationCheckSubmitterScoped</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Account Activation" source="x_naci_account_act">cff40c40dbb29f00f59974131f961939</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Account Activation">cff40c40dbb29f00f59974131f961939</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sp_angular_provider_3917cd90dbba134054d8ff621f96197d</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-07-05 19:31:14</sys_updated_on><type>service</type></sp_angular_provider></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sp_css_c4a416f2db9aaf0054d8ff621f96195f
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sp_css"><sp_css action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><css>::-ms-clear {
  display: none;
}

::-ms-reveal {
  display: none;
}

body {
  height: 100%;
}

#pageTitle {
  color: #FFFFFF;
}

#pageTitle:hover {
  text-decoration: none;
}

#navbar li {
  font-size: 120%;
}

#feedbackButton { 
  margin-left: -30px;
  height: 40px; 
  width: 104px; 
  position: fixed; 
  top: 45%; 
  z-index: 999;
  transform: rotate(-90deg);
  -webkit-transform: rotate(-90deg); 
  -moz-transform: rotate(-90deg); 
  -o-transform: rotate(-90deg); 
  filter: progid:DXImageTransform.Microsoft.BasicImage(rotation=3);
}

#feedbackButton a { 
  display: block; 
  //background: #f00; 
  background-color: #EEEEEE;
  border-radius: 4px;
  height: 40px; 
  width: 110px; 
  padding: 8px 16px;
  color: #333333; 
  //font-family: Arial, sans-serif; 
  font-size: 17px; 
  font-weight: bold; 
  text-decoration: none; 
  border-bottom: solid 1px #333;
  border-left: solid 1px #333;
  border-right: solid 1px #fff;
}

#feedbackButton a:hover { 
  opacity: 0.75; 
}

.fixedWidth {
   width:80%; 
}

.fa-mandatory {
  color: #D9534F;
}

.well {
  padding-top: 0 !important;
}

.panel {
  border: 0 !important;
}

.alert a:not(.close) {
  text-decoration: underline;
}

body .header {
  color: #EEEEEE;
}

body .footer {
  color: #EEEEEE;
  //font-size: 110%;
}

body .footer a {
  color: #EEEEEE;
}

body .footer h2 u {
  color: #FFFFFF;
  font-weight: bold;
}

.footer-column::before {
  position: absolute;
  content: "";
  border-left: 1px solid #666666;
  left: 0;
  top: 0;
  height: 160px;
}

.tile-flip-off {
  display: none;
}

.panel a:hover {
  text-decoration: none;
}

.tile-home {
  border-radius: 4px;
}

.tile-home-lg {
  color: #EEEEEE;
  height: 150px;
}

#tile-home_getHelp {
  background-color: #D9534F;
}

#tile-home_requestSomething {
  background-color: #5CB85C;
}

#tile-home_checkStatus {
  background-color: #337AB7;
}

.tile-home-sm {
  color: #333333;
  background-color: #EEEEEE;
  height: 100px;
}

#filterAccordion #heading_main {
  border-bottom-left-radius: 3px;
  border-bottom-right-radius: 3px;
}

#filterAccordion #a:hover {
  text-decoration: none;
}

.tile-item .tile-request {
  background-color: #F5F5F5;
  color: #333333;
  border-radius: 4px;
  height: 100px;
  padding-right: 75px;
}

.tile-item-help .tile-request-help {
  color: #F5F5F5;
  border-radius: 4px;
  height: 100px;
  background-image: url('list_cant_find.pngx');
  background-repeat: no-repeat;
  background-size: auto 100%;
  background-position: left;
  padding-left: 125px;
}

.tile-item[category="Accounts and Systems Access"] .tile-request {
  background-image: url('grid_accounts.pngx');
  background-repeat: no-repeat;
  background-size: auto 100%;
  background-position: right;
}

.tile-item[category="Network"] .tile-request {
  background-image: url('grid_network.pngx');
  background-repeat: no-repeat;
  background-size: auto 100%;
  background-position: right;
}

.tile-item[category="Hardware"] .tile-request {
  background-image: url('grid_hardware.pngx');
  background-repeat: no-repeat;
  background-size: auto 100%;
  background-position: right;
}

.tile-item[category="Scientific Software"] .tile-request {
  background-image: url('grid_software_yellow.pngx');
  background-repeat: no-repeat;
  background-size: auto 100%;
  background-position: right;
}

.tile-item[category="Non-Scientific Software"] .tile-request {
  background-image: url('grid_software_violet.pngx');
  background-repeat: no-repeat;
  background-size: auto 100%;
  background-position: right;
}

.tile-item[category="Telecommunications"] .tile-request {
  background-image: url('grid_telecommunications.pngx');
  background-repeat: no-repeat;
  background-size: auto 100%;
  background-position: right;
}

.list-item .tile-request {
  padding-left: 125px;
  background-color: #F5F5F5;
}

.list-item[category="Accounts and Systems Access"] .tile-request {
  background-image: url('list_accounts.pngx');
  background-repeat: no-repeat;
  background-size: auto 100%;
  background-position: left;
}

.list-item[category="Network"] .tile-request {
  background-image: url('list_network.pngx');
  background-repeat: no-repeat;
  background-size: auto 100%;
  background-position: left;
}

.list-item[category="Hardware"] .tile-request {
  background-image: url('list_hardware.pngx');
  background-repeat: no-repeat;
  background-size: auto 100%;
  background-position: left;
}

.list-item[category="Scientific Software"] .tile-request {
  background-image: url('list_software_yellow.pngx');
  background-repeat: no-repeat;
  background-size: auto 100%;
  background-position: left;
}

.list-item[category="Non-Scientific Software"] .tile-request {
  background-image: url('list_software_violet.pngx');
  background-repeat: no-repeat;
  background-size: auto 100%;
  background-position: left;
}

.list-item[category="Telecommunications"] .tile-request {
  background-image: url('list_telecommunications.pngx');
  background-repeat: no-repeat;
  background-size: auto 100%;
  background-position: left;
}

#orderVariables a {
  text-decoration: underline;
}

.twitter-typeahead {
  width: 100%;
}

.tt-hint {
  background-color: #F00;
}

.tt-menu {
  background-color: #FFF;
  width: 345px;
  border: 1px solid black;
  box-shadow: 5px 5px 5px #BBB;
}

.tt-suggestion:hover {
  background-color: #0BB;
}

.tt-cursor {
  background-color: #D9EDF7;
}
.tools-owner-title {
    padding-top: 5px;
    padding-bottom: 5px;
    background-color: #F5FAFF;
    color: #0C5C97;
}
footer {
    text-align: center;
}

.footer {
    bottom: 0;
    color: #444;
    padding:25px 0;
}
.footer ul {
    text-align: center;
}
.footer ul li a {
    color: #444;
}
.tools-section {
    padding: 0 20px 10px 20px;
/*
    padding-left: 20px;
    padding-right: 20px;
    padding-bottom: 10px;
*/
    text-align: justify;
/*
    font-size: 90%;
*/
}
fieldset.scheduler-border {
    border: 1px groove #ddd !important;
    padding: 0 1.4em 1.4em 1.4em !important;
    margin: 0 0 1.5em 0 !important;
    -webkit-box-shadow:  0px 0px 0px 0px #000;
            box-shadow:  0px 0px 0px 0px #000;
}

legend.scheduler-border {
     width:inherit; /* Or auto */
    padding:0 10px; /* To give a bit of padding on the left and right */
    border-bottom:none;

}
.panel-heading.blue-panel {
    color: #fff;
    background-color: #0b4d86;
    border-color: #0b4d86;
}
</css><name>account activation override css</name><sys_class_name>sp_css</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-12-14 14:50:17</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>c4a416f2db9aaf0054d8ff621f96195f</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>account activation override css</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Account Activation" source="x_naci_account_act">cff40c40dbb29f00f59974131f961939</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Account Activation">cff40c40dbb29f00f59974131f961939</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sp_css_c4a416f2db9aaf0054d8ff621f96195f</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-02-06 18:42:26</sys_updated_on></sp_css></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ws_operation_aefcce90dbbe134054d8ff621f961944
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl/><http_method>POST</http_method><name>saveUserData</name><operation_script><![CDATA[(function process(/*RESTAPIRequest*/ request, /*RESTAPIResponse*/ response) {
    var message = '';
    var jsonData = [];
    var variables = {};
    var body = request.body.data; //this string will be saved into database
	var action = body.action;
	var userId = body.userId;
	var appName = body.applicationName;
   
	for(key in body){
		variables[key] = body[key];
	}
	
	var saveData = JSON.stringify(variables);
	
	if(action == 'add'){
        var save_request = new GlideRecord('x_naci_account_act_account_activation_saved_request');
        save_request.initialize();
        save_request.u_value = saveData;
        save_request.u_userid = userId;
        save_request.u_application_name = appName;
        message = save_request.insert();
     }else if(action == 'update'){
       var existId = variables['savedId'];
       var update_request = new GlideRecord('x_naci_account_act_account_activation_saved_request');
       update_request.addQuery('sys_id',existId);
       update_request.query();
       update_request.next();
       update_request.u_value = saveData;
       update_request.u_userid = userId;
       update_request.u_application_name = appName;
       answers_sys_id = update_request.update();                    
     }else if(action == 'delete'){
         var saved_id =variables['savedId'];
         var delete_request = new GlideRecord('x_naci_account_act_account_activation_saved_request');
         delete_request.addQuery('sys_id',saved_id);
         delete_request.query();
         delete_request.next();
         answers_sys_id = delete_request.deleteRecord();
         message = saved_id;
     }else{
         message = "Invalid action.";
     }
     jsonData.push({
           message: message,
     });
                
     return jsonData;

})(request, response);]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/x_naci_account_act/accountactivationscoped/saveUserData</operation_uri><produces>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</produces><produces_customized>false</produces_customized><relative_path>/saveUserData</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>false</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>true</requires_authentication><short_description/><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-06-15 20:12:33</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>aefcce90dbbe134054d8ff621f961944</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>saveUserData</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Account Activation" source="x_naci_account_act">cff40c40dbb29f00f59974131f961939</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Account Activation">cff40c40dbb29f00f59974131f961939</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_aefcce90dbbe134054d8ff621f961944</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-08-08 13:58:40</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="accountActivationScoped">7e930e58db7e134054d8ff621f96195e</web_service_definition><web_service_version/></sys_ws_operation></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ws_operation_5aa44e58db7e134054d8ff621f9619a4
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl/><http_method>GET</http_method><name>fetchUserList</name><operation_script><![CDATA[(function process(/*RESTAPIRequest*/ request, /*RESTAPIResponse*/ response) {
	 var users = [];
	 var searchCriteria = request.queryParams.term.toString();
	 var term = searchCriteria.split(" ");
	 var length = term.length;
	 var firstName = term[0];
	 var lastName = term.pop();
 
	 var user_item = new GlideRecord('sys_user');
	 var tmp = user_item.addQuery('first_name', 'STARTSWITH', firstName);
		 tmp.addOrCondition('u_preferred_firstname', 'STARTSWITH', firstName);
         if(length > 1) {
			 user_item.addQuery('last_name', 'STARTSWITH', lastName);
		 }
         user_item.query();
	 
	while(user_item.next()){
		 var value = user_item.getDisplayValue('first_name') + " " + user_item.getDisplayValue('last_name');
		 var label = value;
		 var id = user_item.getDisplayValue('sys_id');
		 var email = user_item.getDisplayValue('email');
		 var phone = user_item.getDisplayValue('phone');
		 var title = user_item.getDisplayValue('title');
		 var manager = user_item.getDisplayValue('manager');
		 var manager_id = user_item.manager.sys_id.toString();
		 var id_number = user_item.getDisplayValue('employee_number');
		 var institution = user_item.getDisplayValue("department");
		 var doc = user_item.getDisplayValue("u_long_org_division");
		 if (email) {
			 label += "  [" + email + "]";
		 }
		 users.push({label: label, value: value, id: id, email: email, phone: phone, title: title, id_number: id_number, manager: manager, manager_id: manager_id, institution: institution, doc: doc});
		 
//		 users.push({'list':{label: label, value: value}, 'fistName': user_item.getDisplayValue('first_name'), 'lastName':user_item.getDisplayValue('last_name'), 'id': user_item.getDisplayValue('sys_id')});
     }
   
     return users;

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ws_operation_196d4ad0dbbe134054d8ff621f961967
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl/><http_method>POST</http_method><name>updateRequestAction</name><operation_script><![CDATA[(function process(/*RESTAPIRequest*/ request, /*RESTAPIResponse*/ response) {
	   var jsonObj = {};
	   var data = request.body.data;
       var request_id = data.request_id;
       var comments = data.approval_comments;
       var action= data.action;
       var role = data.role;

       var gr1 = new GlideRecord("x_naci_account_act_account_activation_table");
       gr1.addQuery("sys_id", request_id);
       gr1.query();
       gr1.next();
	   if(role == 'Direct Supervisor'){
		   gr1.ds_approval_status=action;
	   }else if(role == 'Scientific Directors / Signing Official'){
		   gr1.sdso_approval_status=action;
	   }
       gr1.comments = '(startAction)' + action + '(endAction)(startComments)' +comments + '(endComments)(role)' + role + '(ENDROLE)' + gs.getUserDisplayName() + 'ENDCOMMENTS';
       gr1.update();
	   
	   jsonObj = {
		   status : data
	   };
	
	  return jsonObj;
})(request, response);]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/x_naci_account_act/accountactivationscoped/updateRequestAction</operation_uri><produces>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</produces><produces_customized>false</produces_customized><relative_path>/updateRequestAction</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>false</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>true</requires_authentication><short_description/><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-06-15 20:14:18</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>196d4ad0dbbe134054d8ff621f961967</sys_id><sys_mod_count>13</sys_mod_count><sys_name>updateRequestAction</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Account Activation" source="x_naci_account_act">cff40c40dbb29f00f59974131f961939</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Account Activation">cff40c40dbb29f00f59974131f961939</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_196d4ad0dbbe134054d8ff621f961967</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-09-25 17:05:09</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="accountActivationScoped">7e930e58db7e134054d8ff621f96195e</web_service_definition><web_service_version/></sys_ws_operation></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sp_angular_provider"><sp_angular_provider action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><name>accountactivationGetSubmittedRequestDataScoped</name><script><![CDATA[function accountactivationGetSubmittedRequestDataScoped($http){
	this.getSubmittedRequestData = function(id, sessionId){
			return new Promise(function(resolve, reject){	
			var req = {
				method: 'GET',
				url: '/api/x_naci_account_act/accountactivationscoped/getSubmittedRequestDataById',
				beforeSend: function(xhr) {
					xhr.setRequestHeader('X-UserToken', sessionId);
				},
				headers: {
					'Content-Type': 'application/json'
				},
				params: {
					'id': id
				}
			};		
		  $http(req).then(
			function (response){
				resolve(response.data.result);	
			}, function (error){
				reject(error);
			});
		});	
	};
	
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sp_angular_provider</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-07-09 16:05:32</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>59aa3c80db5f134054d8ff621f96197b</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>accountactivationGetSubmittedRequestDataScoped</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Account Activation" source="x_naci_account_act">cff40c40dbb29f00f59974131f961939</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Account Activation">cff40c40dbb29f00f59974131f961939</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sp_angular_provider_59aa3c80db5f134054d8ff621f96197b</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-07-09 18:44:14</sys_updated_on><type>service</type></sp_angular_provider></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload: custom 126){ $('#commentReviewId1').html(comment_str); $('#commets').show(); }else{ $('#commentReviewId1').html(''); $('#commets').hide(); } window.setDisplayValues(result); } function handleError(error){ console.log(error); alert('ERROR!'); } accountActivationUtilScoped.setButtonOnDisplayPage('PI'); $('#proposalDetail').modal('show'); }; $scope.withdrawItem = function(id){ $('#confirmMessage').html("Are you sure that you want to withdraw this request?"); $('#withdrawId').val(id); $('#confirmationDiv').modal('show'); }; $scope.withdraw = function(){ var id = $('#withdrawId').val(); accountActivationWithdrawRequestScoped.withdraw(id).then(handleResponse, handleError); $('#confirmationDiv').modal('hide'); function handleResponse(data){ console.log(data); } function handleError(data){ alert("ERROR!"); } } $scope.resubmitProposal = function(sysId, number){ $('#errMessage').hide(); var checkbox = accountActivationConstantScoped.getCheckboxNames(); accountactivationGetSubmittedRequestDataScoped.getSubmittedRequestData(sysId, sessionId).then(handleResponse, handleError); function handleResponse (result){ var type = result.type; console.log(result); $('#piName').val(result.name); $('#savedId').val(sysId); $('#isResubmit').val('resubmit'); window.setResubmitFlag('resubmit'); result.confirm = 'yes'; $('#save-bt').hide(); for(var i = 0; i < checkbox.length; i++){ result[checkbox[i]] = (result[checkbox[i]] == 'true'); } var comments = result.comments; var comment_str = accountActivationcommentStringUitlScoped.parseComment(comments); if(comments.length > 126){ $('#commentReviewId2').html(comment_str); $('#commets1').show(); }else{ $('#commentReviewId2').html(''); $('#commets1').hide(); } window.setFormValues(result); $scope.changeModalSize(result.type, result.confirm); $('#permissionForm').modal('show'); } function handleError(error){ alert('ERROR'); } }; $scope.changeModalSize = function(type, answer){ if(answer == 'yes'){ if(type == 'intramural'){ $('#content').css('height', '800px'); } if(type == 'extramural'){ $('#content').css('height', '900px'); } $('#content').css('overflow-y', 'auto'); $('#content').css('overflow-x', 'hide'); } }; function bodyRows(rowCount) { rowCount = rowCount || 10; var body = []; for (var j = 1; j <= rowCount; j++) { body.push({ id: j, name: 'test', email: '1@gmail.com', city: 'qj', expenses: '100' }); } return body; } $scope.report = function(requestId, sdso, updatedDate){ var ids = requestId + '|' + sdso; accountActivationFetchUserByIds.getUserList(sessionId,ids).then(function(res){ var tmp = res.data.result; var requestor = {}; var sdsor = {}; tmp.forEach(function(elem){ if(elem.id == requestId){ requestor.name = elem.value; requestor.id = elem.id_number; requestor.email = elem.email; } else if(elem.id == sdso){ sdsor.name = elem.value; sdsor.id = elem.id_number; sdsor.email = elem.email; } }); var doc = new jsPDF('p', 'pt'); var body = []; body.push({ date: updatedDate, r_name:requestor.name, r_id:requestor.id, r_email:requestor.email, s_name:sdsor.name, s_id:sdsor.id, s_email:sdsor.email }); //var body = [{date:'10/12/2018',r_name:'Wu Ye',r_id:'234',r_email:'wuye@mail.nih.gov',s_name:'Tony Kerverage',s_id:'22',s_email:'tonyk@nih.gov'}]; var head = [{date:'date',r_name:'r_name',r_id:'r_id',r_email:'r_email',s_name:'s_name',s_id:'r_id',s_email:'s_email'},{date:'date',r_name:'r_name',r_id:'r_id',r_email:'r_email',s_name:'s_name',s_id:'r_id',s_email:'s_email'}]; head[0]['date'] = {content: 'DATE', rowSpan: 2, styles: {valign: 'middle', halign: 'center',cellWidth:70}}; head[0]['r_name'] = {content: 'REQUESTOR\'S', colSpan: 3, styles: {halign: 'center'}}; head[0]['s_name'] = {content: 'SIGNING OFFICAL\'S', colSpan: 3, styles: {halign: 'center'}}; head[1]['r_name'] = {content: 'NAME', colSpan: 1, styles: {halign: 'center',cellWidth:70}}; head[1]['r_id'] = {content: 'ID NUMBER', colSpan: 1, styles: {halign: 'center',cellWidth:70}}; head[1]['r_email'] = {content: 'EMAIL ADDRESS', colSpan: 1, styles: {halign: 'center'}}; head[1]['s_name'] = {content: 'NAME', colSpan: 1, styles: {halign: 'center',cellWidth:70}}; head[1]['s_id'] = {content: 'ID NUMBER', colSpan: 1, styles: {halign: 'center',cellWidth:70}}; head[1]['s_email'] = {content: 'EMAIL ADDRESS', colSpan: 1, styles: {halign: 'center'}}; doc.autoTable({ startY: 60, head: head, body: body, headStyles: {fillColor: [11, 77, 134],lineWidth: 1, lineColor: 5,textColor: [255,255,255]}, bodyStyles: {lineWidth: 1, lineColor: 5} }); doc.save('dbGap-report.pdf'); },function(error){ console.log(error); }); }; spUtil.recordWatch($scope, "x_naci_account_act_account_activation_table", "", function(data) { spUtil.update($scope); }); }]]>csp_instancefalseaccount-activation-pi-submitted-pagefalseAccount Activation PI submitted Pagefalsefalsesp_widgetzhoujim@nih.gov2018-07-03 20:07:32falseaf88fa4edb431f0054d8ff621f96199c204Account Activation PI submitted Pagecff40c40dbb29f00f59974131f961939falsecff40c40dbb29f00f59974131f961939sp_widget_af88fa4edb431f0054d8ff621f96199cyuw5@nih.gov2018-10-10 19:32:25

sys_update_xml.name: sp_angular_provider_2e76c990dbba134054d8ff621f961970
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sp_angular_provider"><sp_angular_provider action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><name>accountActivationSubmissionScoped</name><script><![CDATA[function accountActivationSubmissionScoped($http) {
	this.submitRequest = function (param, sessionId){
		return new Promise(function(resolve, reject){	
			var req = {
				method: 'POST',
				url: '/api/x_naci_account_act/accountactivationscoped/submitRequestData',
				beforeSend: function(xhr) {
					xhr.setRequestHeader('X-UserToken', sessionId);
				},
				headers: {
					'Content-Type': 'application/json'
				},
				data: param
			};		
		  $http(req).then(
			function (response){
				resolve(response.data);	
			}, function (error){
				reject(error);
			});
	 }
 )};
 this.resubmitRequest = function (param, sessionId){
		return new Promise(function(resolve, reject){	
			var req = {
				method: 'POST',
				url: '/api/x_naci_account_act/accountactivationscoped/resubmitRequestData',
				beforeSend: function(xhr) {
					xhr.setRequestHeader('X-UserToken', sessionId);
				},
				headers: {
					'Content-Type': 'application/json'
				},
				data: param
			};		
		  $http(req).then(
			function (response){
				resolve(response.data);	
			}, function (error){
				reject(error);
			});	 
		}
)};											 

}]]></script><sys_class_name>sp_angular_provider</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-06-15 15:04:16</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>2e76c990dbba134054d8ff621f961970</sys_id><sys_mod_count>8</sys_mod_count><sys_name>accountActivationSubmissionScoped</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Account Activation" source="x_naci_account_act">cff40c40dbb29f00f59974131f961939</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Account Activation">cff40c40dbb29f00f59974131f961939</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sp_angular_provider_2e76c990dbba134054d8ff621f961970</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-07-13 19:25:05</sys_updated_on><type>service</type></sp_angular_provider></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload: custom 126){ $('#commentReviewId1').html(comment_str); $('#commets').show(); }else{ $('#commentReviewId1').html(''); $('#commets').hide(); } window.setDisplayValues(result); } function handleError(error){ console.log(error); alert('ERROR!'); } accountActivationUtilScoped.setButtonOnDisplayPage('PI'); $('#proposalDetail').modal('show'); }; $scope.report = function(requestId, sdso, updatedDate){ var ids = requestId + '|' + sdso; accountActivationFetchUserByIds.getUserList(sessionId,ids).then(function(res){ var tmp = res.data.result; var requestor = {}; var sdsor = {}; tmp.forEach(function(elem){ if(elem.id == requestId){ requestor.name = elem.value; requestor.id = elem.id_number; requestor.email = elem.email; } else if(elem.id == sdso){ sdsor.name = elem.value; sdsor.id = elem.id_number; sdsor.email = elem.email; } }); var doc = new jsPDF('p', 'pt'); var body = []; body.push({ date: updatedDate, r_name:requestor.name, r_id:requestor.id, r_email:requestor.email, s_name:sdsor.name, s_id:sdsor.id, s_email:sdsor.email }); //var body = [{date:'10/12/2018',r_name:'Wu Ye',r_id:'234',r_email:'wuye@mail.nih.gov',s_name:'Tony Kerverage',s_id:'22',s_email:'tonyk@nih.gov'}]; var head = [{date:'date',r_name:'r_name',r_id:'r_id',r_email:'r_email',s_name:'s_name',s_id:'r_id',s_email:'s_email'},{date:'date',r_name:'r_name',r_id:'r_id',r_email:'r_email',s_name:'s_name',s_id:'r_id',s_email:'s_email'}]; head[0]['date'] = {content: 'DATE', rowSpan: 2, styles: {valign: 'middle', halign: 'center',cellWidth:70}}; head[0]['r_name'] = {content: 'REQUESTOR\'S', colSpan: 3, styles: {halign: 'center'}}; head[0]['s_name'] = {content: 'SIGNING OFFICAL\'S', colSpan: 3, styles: {halign: 'center'}}; head[1]['r_name'] = {content: 'NAME', colSpan: 1, styles: {halign: 'center',cellWidth:70}}; head[1]['r_id'] = {content: 'ID NUMBER', colSpan: 1, styles: {halign: 'center',cellWidth:70}}; head[1]['r_email'] = {content: 'EMAIL ADDRESS', colSpan: 1, styles: {halign: 'center'}}; head[1]['s_name'] = {content: 'NAME', colSpan: 1, styles: {halign: 'center',cellWidth:70}}; head[1]['s_id'] = {content: 'ID NUMBER', colSpan: 1, styles: {halign: 'center',cellWidth:70}}; head[1]['s_email'] = {content: 'EMAIL ADDRESS', colSpan: 1, styles: {halign: 'center'}}; doc.autoTable({ startY: 60, head: head, body: body, headStyles: {fillColor: [11, 77, 134],lineWidth: 1, lineColor: 5,textColor: [255,255,255]}, bodyStyles: {lineWidth: 1, lineColor: 5} }); doc.save('dbGap-report.pdf'); },function(error){ console.log(error); }); }; spUtil.recordWatch($scope, "sysapproval_approver", "", function() { spUtil.update($scope); $scope.count = c.data.sdsoReviewedData.length; }); }]]>csp_instancefalseaccount_activation_sdso_reviewed_scopedfalseAccount Activation SDSO reviewed Scopedfalsefalsesp_widgetzhoujim@nih.gov2018-07-12 18:14:15false77e43c4ddb1b530054d8ff621f96199447Account Activation SDSO reviewed Scopedcff40c40dbb29f00f59974131f961939falsecff40c40dbb29f00f59974131f961939sp_widget_77e43c4ddb1b530054d8ff621f961994yuw5@nih.gov2018-10-10 19:33:32

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sp_angular_provider"><sp_angular_provider action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><name>getSavedRequestDataScoped</name><script><![CDATA[function getSavedRequestDataScoped($http){
	this.getSavedData = function(id){
		return new Promise(function(resolve, reject){	
			var req = {
				method: 'GET',
				url: '/api/x_naci_account_act/accountactivationscoped/getSavedRequestData',
				beforeSend: function(xhr) {
					xhr.setRequestHeader('X-UserToken', sessionId);
				},
				headers: {
					'Content-Type': 'application/json'
				},
				params: {
					'id': id
				}
			};		
		  $http(req).then(
			function (response){
				resolve(response.data.result);	
			}, function (error){
				reject(error);
			});
		});	
	}
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sp_angular_provider</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-06-15 18:55:19</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>863bb150db7e134054d8ff621f961907</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>getSavedRequestDataScoped</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Account Activation" source="x_naci_account_act">cff40c40dbb29f00f59974131f961939</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Account Activation">cff40c40dbb29f00f59974131f961939</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sp_angular_provider_863bb150db7e134054d8ff621f961907</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-06-15 20:20:21</sys_updated_on><type>service</type></sp_angular_provider></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sysauto_script_6d412f61dbc5a740b86770c08c96193a
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sysauto_script"><sysauto_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><condition/><conditional>false</conditional><name>dbGaP Weekly check approval records</name><run_as/><run_as_tz/><run_dayofmonth>1</run_dayofmonth><run_dayofweek>1</run_dayofweek><run_period/><run_start>2018-10-09 19:54:03</run_start><run_time>1970-01-01 05:10:00</run_time><run_type>weekly</run_type><script><![CDATA[//check approval status, if approval is not acting in 1 week, send an email to approver to remind. If approval is not acting in 2 week, send an eamil to approver to
//remind. If approval is not acting in 3 weeks, send an emaill to requestor to ask him/her to talk to approver. 

var nowDay = new GlideDateTime(); //nowDay should be query result from database
var nowDay1 = new GlideDateTime();
var nowDay2 = new GlideDateTime();
var nowDay3 = new GlideDateTime();


nowDay1.addWeeksLocalTime(-1); //reduce one week
nowDay2.addWeeksLocalTime(-2); //reduce two weeks
nowDay3.addWeeksLocalTime(-3); //reduce three weeks

var task = new GlideRecord('x_naci_account_act_account_activation_table');
    task.addQuery('active', true);
    task.query();

    //nowDay.addWeeksLocalTime(-2); //test only

while(task.next()){
	   if(task.stage.toString() != "Waiting for DS Review" && task.stage.toString() != "Rejected by SD/SO-Waiting for DS Review" && 
		 task.stage.toString() != 'Waiting for SD/SO Review'){
		   continue;
	   }else{
		   nowDay = task.sys_updated_on;
	   }
	
   if(nowDay <= nowDay1 && nowDay > nowDay2){
       //in first week
	   var receipient = '';
	   if(task.stage.toString() == 'Waiting for DS Review' || task.stage.toString() == 'Rejected by SD/SO-Waiting for DS Review'){
		   receipient = task.manager.toString();
	   }else if(task.stage.toString() == 'Waiting for SD/SO Review'){
		   receipient = task.sdso.toString();
	   }
	   var user = new GlideRecord('sys_user');
	       user.addQuery('sys_id', receipient);
	   user.query();
	   user.next();
	   var email = user.email.toString();
	   gs.eventQueue('x_naci_account_act.dbGaP_weekly_approver', task, email, '1');
   }else if(nowDay <= nowDay2 && nowDay > nowDay3){
       //in second week
	   var receipient = '';
	   if(task.stage.toString() == 'Waiting for DS Review' || task.stage.toString() == 'Rejected by SD/SO-Waiting for DS Review'){
		   receipient = task.manager.toString();
	   }else if(task.stage.toString() == 'Waiting for SD/SO Review'){
		   receipient = task.sdso.toString();
	   }
	   var user = new GlideRecord('sys_user');
	       user.addQuery('sys_id', receipient);
	   user.query();
	   user.next();
	   var email = user.email.toString();
      gs.eventQueue('x_naci_account_act.dbGaP_weekly_approver', task, email, '2');
   }else if(nowDay <= nowDay3){
       //in third week or less
	    var user = new GlideRecord('sys_user');
	        user.addQuery('employee_number', task.id_number.toString());
	    user.query();
	    user.next();
	    var email = user.email.toString();
	    gs.eventQueue('x_naci_account_act.dbGaP_weekly_requeste', task, email, '3');
   }
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sysauto_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-10-09 19:55:03</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>6d412f61dbc5a740b86770c08c96193a</sys_id><sys_mod_count>32</sys_mod_count><sys_name>dbGaP Weekly check approval records</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Account Activation" source="x_naci_account_act">cff40c40dbb29f00f59974131f961939</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Account Activation">cff40c40dbb29f00f59974131f961939</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sysauto_script_6d412f61dbc5a740b86770c08c96193a</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-12-13 18:04:25</sys_updated_on><upgrade_safe>false</upgrade_safe></sysauto_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ws_operation_51248298db7e134054d8ff621f961928
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl/><http_method>GET</http_method><name>checkSubmitter</name><operation_script><![CDATA[(function process(/*RESTAPIRequest*/ request, /*RESTAPIResponse*/ response) {
	//this function is checking if the user has been submitted a request or not
	//if yes, return true, then this user cannot submit a request anymore
	//if No, return false, then this user can submit a request.
	var result = false;

	var id_number = request.queryParams.id_number.toString();
	var short_description = request.queryParams.desc.toString();
	var item = new GlideRecord('x_naci_account_act_account_activation_table');
	item.addQuery('short_description', short_description);
	item.query();
	while(item.next()){
		var id_num = item.id_number.toString();
		if(id_num == id_number){
			result = true;
			break;
		}
	}
	
	return result;
})(request, response);]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/x_naci_account_act/accountactivationscoped/checkSubmitter</operation_uri><produces>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</produces><produces_customized>false</produces_customized><relative_path>/checkSubmitter</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>false</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>true</requires_authentication><short_description/><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-06-15 19:34:33</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>51248298db7e134054d8ff621f961928</sys_id><sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count><sys_name>checkSubmitter</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Account Activation" source="x_naci_account_act">cff40c40dbb29f00f59974131f961939</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Account Activation">cff40c40dbb29f00f59974131f961939</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_51248298db7e134054d8ff621f961928</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-07-05 19:32:22</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="accountActivationScoped">7e930e58db7e134054d8ff621f96195e</web_service_definition><web_service_version/></sys_ws_operation></record_update>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl/><http_method>GET</http_method><name>withdrawRequest</name><operation_script><![CDATA[(function process(/*RESTAPIRequest*/ request, /*RESTAPIResponse*/ response) {
      var jsonArr = [];
	  var sysId = request.queryParams.sysId;
      var gr = new GlideRecord('x_naci_account_act_account_activation_table');
      gr.addQuery('sys_id',sysId); //to delete one record
      gr.query();
      gr.next();
      gr.deleteRecord();
	
	  jsonArr.push({
		 message: "succeed" 
	  });

	return jsonArr;
	
})(request, response);]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/x_naci_account_act/accountactivationscoped/withdrawRequest</operation_uri><produces>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</produces><produces_customized>false</produces_customized><relative_path>/withdrawRequest</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>false</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>true</requires_authentication><short_description/><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-06-15 20:15:05</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>a89d0ed0dbbe134054d8ff621f96197c</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>withdrawRequest</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Account Activation" source="x_naci_account_act">cff40c40dbb29f00f59974131f961939</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Account Activation">cff40c40dbb29f00f59974131f961939</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_a89d0ed0dbbe134054d8ff621f96197c</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-07-09 20:38:35</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="accountActivationScoped">7e930e58db7e134054d8ff621f96195e</web_service_definition><web_service_version/></sys_ws_operation></record_update>

/* Component containers

.ui-widget {

.ui-state-hover a:hover,
.ui-state-hover a:link,

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sp_angular_provider"><sp_angular_provider action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><name>accountActivationActionUpdateScoped</name><script><![CDATA[function accountActivationActionUpdateScoped($http){
	//params is JSON Object
	this.updateRequest = function(params, sessionId){
		return new Promise(function(resolve, reject){
			var req ={
				 url: '/api/x_naci_account_act/accountactivationscoped/updateRequestAction',
				 method : "POST",
				 beforeSend: function(xhr){ xhr.setRequestHeader('X-UserToken', sessionId); },
				 headers: {
						'Content-Type': 'application/json'
					},
				 data : params				
			};
			$http(req).then(handleResponse, handleError);
			 function handleResponse(response){
					var result = response.data.result;
					console.log(result.status);
				}
			
				function handleError(){
					console.error(response);
					alert('ERROR');
				}
			
		});
	};			   
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sp_angular_provider</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-07-11 20:13:58</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>dba64874db9b1300f59974131f96199b</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>accountActivationActionUpdateScoped</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Account Activation" source="x_naci_account_act">cff40c40dbb29f00f59974131f961939</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Account Activation">cff40c40dbb29f00f59974131f961939</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sp_angular_provider_dba64874db9b1300f59974131f96199b</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-07-11 21:25:53</sys_updated_on><type>service</type></sp_angular_provider></record_update>

}
.pull-left{
	float:left
}
.fa.pull-left{
	margin-right:.3em
}
.fa.pull-right{
	margin-left:.3em
}
.fa-spin{
	-webkit-animation:fa-spin 2s infinite linear;
	animation:fa-spin 2s infinite linear
}
.fa-pulse{
	-webkit-animation:fa-spin 1s infinite steps(8);
	animation:fa-spin 1s infinite steps(8)
}
@-webkit-keyframes fa-spin{
	0%{
		-webkit-transform:rotate(0deg);
		transform:rotate(0deg)
}
	100%{
		-webkit-transform:rotate(359deg);
		transform:rotate(359deg)
}
}
@keyframes fa-spin{
	0%{
		-webkit-transform:rotate(0deg);
		transform:rotate(0deg)
}
	100%{
		-webkit-transform:rotate(359deg);
		transform:rotate(359deg)
}
}
.fa-rotate-90{
	filter:progid:DXImageTransform.Microsoft.BasicImage(rotation=1);
	-webkit-transform:rotate(90deg);
	-ms-transform:rotate(90deg);
	transform:rotate(90deg)
}
.fa-rotate-180{
	filter:progid:DXImageTransform.Microsoft.BasicImage(rotation=2);
	-webkit-transform:rotate(180deg);
	-ms-transform:rotate(180deg);
	transform:rotate(180deg)
}
.fa-rotate-270{
	filter:progid:DXImageTransform.Microsoft.BasicImage(rotation=3);
	-webkit-transform:rotate(270deg);
	-ms-transform:rotate(270deg);
	transform:rotate(270deg)
}
.fa-flip-horizontal{
	filter:progid:DXImageTransform.Microsoft.BasicImage(rotation=0, mirror=1);
	-webkit-transform:scale(-1, 1);
	-ms-transform:scale(-1, 1);
	transform:scale(-1, 1)
}
.fa-flip-vertical{
	filter:progid:DXImageTransform.Microsoft.BasicImage(rotation=2, mirror=1);
	-webkit-transform:scale(1, -1);
	-ms-transform:scale(1, -1);
	transform:scale(1, -1)
}
:root .fa-rotate-90,:root .fa-rotate-180,:root .fa-rotate-270,:root .fa-flip-horizontal,:root .fa-flip-vertical{
	filter:none
}

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sp_angular_provider"><sp_angular_provider action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><name>accountActivationGetApproverList</name><script><![CDATA[function accountActivationGetApproverList($http){
	this.getApproverList = function(sessionId){
		return new Promise(function(resolve, reject){
			$http({
				url: '/api/x_naci_account_act/accountactivationscoped/getApproverList',
				 method : "GET",
				 beforeSend: function(xhr){ xhr.setRequestHeader('X-UserToken', sessionId); },
				 headers: {'Content-Type': 'application/json'},
				 params: {}				
			}).then(resolve, reject);
		});
	};
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sp_angular_provider</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>yuw5@nih.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-10-09 14:32:30</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>78279ae9db81a740b86770c08c9619f7</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>accountActivationGetApproverList</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Account Activation" source="x_naci_account_act">cff40c40dbb29f00f59974131f961939</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Account Activation">cff40c40dbb29f00f59974131f961939</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sp_angular_provider_78279ae9db81a740b86770c08c9619f7</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>yuw5@nih.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-10-09 14:32:30</sys_updated_on><type>service</type></sp_angular_provider></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sp_angular_provider_599061ccdb9f134054d8ff621f9619c5
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sp_angular_provider"><sp_angular_provider action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><name>accountActivationUtilScoped</name><script><![CDATA[function accountActivationUtilScoped(){
	this.setButtonOnDisplayPage = function(type){
		if(type == 'PI'){
			$('#okDiv').show();
			$('#commentTextarea').hide();
			$('#dsActionDiv').hide();
		}else if(type == 'DS'){
			$('#okDiv').hide();
			$('#commentTextarea').show();
			$('#dsActionDiv').show();			
		}
	}
} ]]></script><sys_class_name>sp_angular_provider</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-07-09 18:51:17</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>599061ccdb9f134054d8ff621f9619c5</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>accountActivationUtilScoped</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Account Activation" source="x_naci_account_act">cff40c40dbb29f00f59974131f961939</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Account Activation">cff40c40dbb29f00f59974131f961939</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sp_angular_provider_599061ccdb9f134054d8ff621f9619c5</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-07-09 18:51:17</sys_updated_on><type>service</type></sp_angular_provider></record_update>

alert('ERROR!'); } accountActivationUtilScoped.setButtonOnDisplayPage('PI'); $('#proposalDetail').modal('show'); }; $scope.report = function(requestId, sdso, updatedDate){ var ids = requestId + '|' + sdso; accountActivationFetchUserByIds.getUserList(sessionId,ids).then(function(res){ var tmp = res.data.result; var requestor = {}; var sdsor = {}; tmp.forEach(function(elem){ if(elem.id == requestId){ requestor.name = elem.value; requestor.id = elem.id_number; requestor.email = elem.email; } else if(elem.id == sdso){ sdsor.name = elem.value; sdsor.id = elem.id_number; sdsor.email = elem.email; } }); var doc = new jsPDF('p', 'pt'); var body = []; body.push({ date: updatedDate, r_name:requestor.name, r_id:requestor.id, r_email:requestor.email, s_name:sdsor.name, s_id:sdsor.id, s_email:sdsor.email }); //var body = [{date:'10/12/2018',r_name:'Wu Ye',r_id:'234',r_email:'wuye@mail.nih.gov',s_name:'Tony Kerverage',s_id:'22',s_email:'tonyk@nih.gov'}]; var head = [{date:'date',r_name:'r_name',r_id:'r_id',r_email:'r_email',s_name:'s_name',s_id:'r_id',s_email:'s_email'},{date:'date',r_name:'r_name',r_id:'r_id',r_email:'r_email',s_name:'s_name',s_id:'r_id',s_email:'s_email'}]; head[0]['date'] = {content: 'DATE', rowSpan: 2, styles: {valign: 'middle', halign: 'center',cellWidth:70}}; head[0]['r_name'] = {content: 'REQUESTOR\'S', colSpan: 3, styles: {halign: 'center'}}; head[0]['s_name'] = {content: 'SIGNING OFFICAL\'S', colSpan: 3, styles: {halign: 'center'}}; head[1]['r_name'] = {content: 'NAME', colSpan: 1, styles: {halign: 'center',cellWidth:70}}; head[1]['r_id'] = {content: 'ID NUMBER', colSpan: 1, styles: {halign: 'center',cellWidth:70}}; head[1]['r_email'] = {content: 'EMAIL ADDRESS', colSpan: 1, styles: {halign: 'center'}}; head[1]['s_name'] = {content: 'NAME', colSpan: 1, styles: {halign: 'center',cellWidth:70}}; head[1]['s_id'] = {content: 'ID NUMBER', colSpan: 1, styles: {halign: 'center',cellWidth:70}}; head[1]['s_email'] = {content: 'EMAIL ADDRESS', colSpan: 1, styles: {halign: 'center'}}; doc.autoTable({ startY: 60, head: head, body: body, headStyles: {fillColor: [11, 77, 134],lineWidth: 1, lineColor: 5,textColor: [255,255,255]}, bodyStyles: {lineWidth: 1, lineColor: 5} }); doc.save('dbGap-report.pdf'); },function(error){ console.log(error); }); }; spUtil.recordWatch($scope, "x_naci_account_act_account_activation_table", "", function() { spUtil.update($scope); }); }]]>csp_instancefalseaccount_activation_ds_reviewed_scopedfalseAccount Activation DS reviewed Scopedfalsefalsesp_widgetzhoujim@nih.gov2018-07-12 14:23:51falsea830cc81db97530054d8ff621f96195136Account Activation DS reviewed Scopedcff40c40dbb29f00f59974131f961939falsecff40c40dbb29f00f59974131f961939sp_widget_a830cc81db97530054d8ff621f961951yuw5@nih.gov2018-10-10 19:31:36

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl/><http_method>POST</http_method><name>resubmitRequestData</name><operation_script><![CDATA[(function process(/*RESTAPIRequest*/ request, /*RESTAPIResponse*/ response) {
	//names = ['name', 'title', 'id_number', 'manager', 'tenure_track', 'senior_scientist', 'staff_scientist','administrative','substantial_research','need_access','oversight', 'type', 'projectId'];
  
	var jsonData = [];
    var body = request.body.data; 
    var sys_id = body.sysId;
	
	var gr_request = new GlideRecord('x_naci_account_act_account_activation_table');
        gr_request.addQuery('sys_id', sys_id);
	gr_request.query();
	gr_request.next();
	
	//gr_request.u_cms_submitted = true;
	gr_request.u_requested_for = body.requested_for;
	gr_request.opened_by = body.opened_by;
	gr_request.short_description = body.short_description;
	gr_request.name = body.name;
	gr_request.title = body.title;
	gr_request.inistitute = body.institute;
	gr_request.division = body.division;
	gr_request.id_number = body.id_number;
	gr_request.manager = body.manager;
	gr_request.tenure_track = body.tenure_track;
	gr_request.senior_scientist = body.senior_scientist;
	gr_request.staff_scientist = body.staff_scientist;
	gr_request.program_officer = body.program_officer;
	gr_request.project_officer = body.project_officer;
	gr_request.other = body.other;
	gr_request.administrative = body.administrative;
	gr_request.substantial_research = body.substantial_research;
	gr_request.need_access = body.need_access;
	gr_request.oversight = body.oversight;
	gr_request.type = body.type;
	gr_request.sdso = body.sdso;
	gr_request.pi_resubmission = 'approved';
	gr_request.extra_comments = body.additionalComments;
	gr_request.update();

	jsonData.push({
      	   number: body.manager
     });
	
	return jsonData[0];
	
})(request, response);]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/x_naci_account_act/accountactivationscoped/resubmitRequestData</operation_uri><produces>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</produces><produces_customized>false</produces_customized><relative_path>/resubmitRequestData</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>false</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>true</requires_authentication><short_description/><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-07-13 19:18:49</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>f83d46d9db97930054d8ff621f961926</sys_id><sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count><sys_name>resubmitRequestData</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Account Activation" source="x_naci_account_act">cff40c40dbb29f00f59974131f961939</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Account Activation">cff40c40dbb29f00f59974131f961939</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_f83d46d9db97930054d8ff621f961926</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-09-25 16:03:02</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="accountActivationScoped">7e930e58db7e134054d8ff621f96195e</web_service_definition><web_service_version/></sys_ws_operation></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ws_operation_8e185a2ddb81a740b86770c08c9619b7
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl>cf9d01d3e73003009d6247e603f6a990</enforce_acl><http_method>GET</http_method><name>getApproverList</name><operation_script><![CDATA[(function process(/*RESTAPIRequest*/ request, /*RESTAPIResponse*/ response) {

	//var type = request.queryParams.name;
	var list = [];
	var gr = new GlideRecord('x_naci_account_act_account_activation_approver');
		gr.orderBy('type');
	gr.query();
	while(gr.next()){
		var item = {};
		
		item.abbr = gr.getDisplayValue('division');
		item.value = gr.getDisplayValue('division_full_name');
		item.manager_id = gr.getDisplayValue('manager_id');
		item.manager_name = gr.getDisplayValue('manager_name');
		item.approver = gr.getDisplayValue('approver_id');
		list.push(item);
	}
    
	return list;

})(request, response);]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/x_naci_account_act/accountactivationscoped/getApproverList</operation_uri><produces>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</produces><produces_customized>false</produces_customized><relative_path>/getApproverList</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>false</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>true</requires_authentication><short_description/><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>yuw5@nih.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-10-09 14:44:44</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>8e185a2ddb81a740b86770c08c9619b7</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>getApproverList</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Account Activation" source="x_naci_account_act">cff40c40dbb29f00f59974131f961939</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Account Activation">cff40c40dbb29f00f59974131f961939</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_8e185a2ddb81a740b86770c08c9619b7</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>yuw5@nih.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-10-09 14:44:44</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="accountActivationScoped">7e930e58db7e134054d8ff621f96195e</web_service_definition><web_service_version/></sys_ws_operation></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ws_operation_313dc6d0dbbe134054d8ff621f961984
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl/><http_method>POST</http_method><name>submitRequestData</name><operation_script><![CDATA[(function process(/*RESTAPIRequest*/ request, /*RESTAPIResponse*/ response) {
	//names = ['name', 'title', 'id_number', 'manager', 'tenure_track', 'senior_scientist', 'staff_scientist','administrative','substantial_research','need_access','oversight', 'type', 'projectId'];
  
	var jsonData = [];
    var body = request.body.data; 
    
	//var comments = body.comments;
	//comments_and_work_notes - column name
	
	var gr_request = new GlideRecord('x_naci_account_act_account_activation_table');
	
	gr_request.initialize();
	//gr_request.u_cms_submitted = true;
	gr_request.u_requested_for = body.requested_for;
	gr_request.opened_by = body.opened_by;
	gr_request.short_description = body.short_description;
	gr_request.name = body.name;
	gr_request.title = body.title;
	gr_request.inistitute = body.institute;
	gr_request.division = body.division;
	gr_request.id_number = body.id_number;
	gr_request.manager = body.manager;
	gr_request.tenure_track = body.tenure_track;
	gr_request.senior_scientist = body.senior_scientist;
	gr_request.staff_scientist = body.staff_scientist;
	gr_request.program_officer = body.program_officer;
	gr_request.project_officer = body.project_officer;
	gr_request.other = body.other;
	gr_request.administrative = body.administrative;
	gr_request.substantial_research = body.substantial_research;
	gr_request.need_access = body.need_access;
	gr_request.oversight = body.oversight;
	gr_request.type = body.type;
	gr_request.sdso = body.sdso;
	gr_request.extra_comments = body.additionalComments;
	var task_id = gr_request.insert();

	jsonData.push({
           submit_id: (task_id.toString()),
		   number: body.manager
     });
	
	return jsonData[0];
	
})(request, response);]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/x_naci_account_act/accountactivationscoped/submitRequestData</operation_uri><produces>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</produces><produces_customized>false</produces_customized><relative_path>/submitRequestData</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>false</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>true</requires_authentication><short_description/><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-06-15 20:13:30</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>313dc6d0dbbe134054d8ff621f961984</sys_id><sys_mod_count>13</sys_mod_count><sys_name>submitRequestData</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Account Activation" source="x_naci_account_act">cff40c40dbb29f00f59974131f961939</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Account Activation">cff40c40dbb29f00f59974131f961939</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_313dc6d0dbbe134054d8ff621f961984</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-09-23 20:17:20</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="accountActivationScoped">7e930e58db7e134054d8ff621f96195e</web_service_definition><web_service_version/></sys_ws_operation></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sp_angular_provider"><sp_angular_provider action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><name>accountActivationFetchUserByIds</name><script><![CDATA[function accountActivationFetchUserByIds($http){
	this.getUserList = function(sessionId, ids){
		return new Promise(function(resolve, reject){
			$http({
				url: '/api/x_naci_account_act/accountactivationscoped/fetchUserByIds',
				 method : "GET",
				 beforeSend: function(xhr){ xhr.setRequestHeader('X-UserToken', sessionId); },
				 headers: {'Content-Type': 'application/json'},
				 params: {ids: ids}				
			}).then(resolve, reject);
		});
	};
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sp_angular_provider</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>yuw5@nih.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-10-10 17:06:02</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>c5e34c46db85e740b86770c08c9619b1</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>accountActivationFetchUserByIds</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Account Activation" source="x_naci_account_act">cff40c40dbb29f00f59974131f961939</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Account Activation">cff40c40dbb29f00f59974131f961939</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sp_angular_provider_c5e34c46db85e740b86770c08c9619b1</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>yuw5@nih.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-10-10 17:46:14</sys_updated_on><type>service</type></sp_angular_provider></record_update>
